description.value: A Creature of the warp. Increase Toughness Bonus by X against all damage that is not as a result of Force Weapons, Psychic Powers, Holy Attacks, or other Daemonic Creatures. Also Immune to Poison and Disease. Creature gains additional benefits if they are a Psyker. DH 2E: Also gain the Undying Trait

system.benefit: A Creature of the warp. Increase Toughness Bonus by X against all damage that is not as a result of Force Weapons, Psychic Powers, Holy Attacks, or other Daemonic Creatures. Also Immune to Poison and Disease. Creature gains additional benefits if they are a Psyker. DH 2E: Also gain the Undying Trait
